snippet.title: BreakBall | Steam Wishlist Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2897750/BreakBall/
Follow development on Discord: https://discord.gg/XTNdykqhpv

Shoot your friends with balls that bounce off walls in this fast-paced tactical arena fighter. Discover dozens of modifiers and millions of combinations, and beat your friends by being the fastest to adapt to the ever-changing rules!

Coming out in Q3 2024!
